name: Bumblebees R Us Childcare Center Reviews

review.title: “fun and loving”
review.pros: Pros – team work and getting along with everyone
review.cons: Cons – long days and parents complaints
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend

review.title: “Horrible company to work for at brooklyn Location”
review.pros: Pros – Well fundedClassrooms are equip with educational material.The Teaching staff is wonderful.
review.cons: Cons – This company (HR and Management) doesn't value their workers.No pay for holidaysChecks are cut twice a month and are always late and wrong.No BenefitsVery High staff turn overEmployees are often not notified about companies changes.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – A company that values their workers will always have value to give to their customers.

review.title: “Potentially a great place, but little value for teachers/workers”
review.pros: Pros – - Great potential for a curriculum focusing on multiple intelligences.- Clean center (though the teachers were the custodians for the various rooms)
review.cons: Cons – - Holidays not paid.- High staff turnover- Staff were sent home if a certain number of children did not attend for the day- No benefits package- Low pay
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – - Value your good teachers/teacher assistants rather than money.- Hire teachers based on their credentials, not on prior friendships.
